item.title: Borderlands 4: Rush the Gate Stuck Glitch Fix
item.description:
If Borderlands 4 players have managed to breach Idolator Sol's fortress in Rush the Gate, they might have made a small error, in which they've fallen from the large elevator while they were on their way to kill him. While most players might be concerned that they've locked themselves out of completing the mission and making Sol face justice, that isn't the case at all. Below, we'll show you exactly how to fix the Rush the Gate elevator glitch in Borderlands 4 so that you can get back to the top and enjoy the spoils of loot gifted to you by Idolator Sol.

How to Get Back on the Elevator in Rush the Gate

How to Fix the Rush the Gate Stuck Glitch

Once players have entered Fortress Indomita, they will eventually find themselves with the sole objective to kill Idolator Sol. This leads them to a small room with an elevator chamber, but if players manage to miss the elevator and find themselves stuck at the bottom, there is a fix for that. All players need to do is head to the left from within the room, where they can find a platform that contains a lever. Simply pull the lever to see the elevator return. If the lever is inoperable, return to the main menu, and you will respawn within Fortress Indomita, where you can pull it again.

The video above showcases the solution to both elevators in Rush the Gate so you won't have to be stuck for long!

There's also the first elevator in Idolator's Noose just before you enter the fortress, and we've got a fix for that, too. If the elevator is above, then you can flip the switch beside the two Outbounder corpses. However, there's another way up. Simply take the stairs opposite the switch and double jump, where you can grapple all the way to the top.

16
7.3 /10
8 /10

item.title: Borderlands 4: How to Beat Idolator Sol Boss (All Rewards)
item.description:
Borderlands 4 features fun boss battles that don't just rely on the DPS of players but instead offer unique mechanics to keep the fight refreshing. Idolator Sol is the first Timekeeper's general that players will be facing in the game. While the boss is immune to all damage due to his hardened armor, players will need to find a way to strip away his defenses and make him vulnerable again. Here's how to defeat the Idolator Sol boss, and what type of rewards you can expect after defeating him.

Where to Find Idolator Sol Boss in Borderlands 4 (Location)

Players will be facing off against Idolator Sol boss during Rush the Gate, the sixth main mission of Borderlands 4 . After leading an assault with the Outbounders to Fortress Indomita, players will make their way through various sections, battling the Timekeeper's soldiers until they finally reach Idolator Sol's ship. After halting the ship's launch, you'll need to infiltrate it and find the boss arena, which won't be that far off.

After arriving in an open area with two vending machines and a downward slope, make sure to stock up on ammo and other gear before heading down to start the boss encounter. The best weapon to use against Idolator Sol is SMGs or Assault Rifles , as it'll be hard to get close to the boss without getting smacked.

How to Beat Idolator Sol Boss in Borderlands 4

Idolator Sol has a hulking body that's covered in armor plating , which is immune to all damage. Players will need to find a way to strip this coating of armor away to expose his true body underneath, which is vulnerable to damage. The boss also has three bars of health, each signifying a phase of the fight. Let's check out all Idolator Sol's attacks first and then cover how you can defeat him.

All Idolator Sol Boss Attacks

Attack Image

Move Name

Attack Pattern

How to Dodge

Shield Bash

Idolator Sol will wield his shield and charge towards players.

The boss will charge in a straight line, so simply dodge away from his path.

Sword Spin

The boss will materialize a sword into the air and then swipe it around the arena in a large AOE.

The AOE of the sword spin attack is too wide for players to run or dodge away from it. Instead, quickly gain height by double-jumping into the air and hovering for a while.

Locust Beam

Idolator Sol will charge up an energy beam into his left hand and shoot at the players. While the direction of the beam is static in the first phase, it'll hone on the player's locations in the later phases.

In the first phase, players will get visible cues when the boss is charging up the beam, so dodging sideways will work just fine. For the homing variant of the attack, players will need to constantly run sideways to avoid getting hit.

Ground Spikes

The boss will strike its fist into the ground and create spikes that will protrude from the ground. There's another version of this attack that will shatter the ground with Locust energy, but no spikes.

Similar to Locust Beam, the visual cues for this attack will be clear. So, make sure to jump and then dodge away to create distance between you and the boss.

Thunder Call

During phase 2 of the fight, Idolator Sol will cover the area in Locust energy and raise his hand in the air, about to rain down Locust-infused thunderbolts.

Players will need to quickly spot the designated glowing area and head inside it to shield themselves from the thunderous attack.

Impaler Rods

Throughout the fight, the boss will bring down a row of red Impaler Rods, with one green rod carrying a Lostcust Canister. As the fight progresses, the rows will increase in number with Phase two having two rows, and phase three calling down three rows of rods.

This is the easiest attack to dodge as players will see a clear projection of where the rods will fall on the field. This attack is also the primary way to strip away Idolator Sol's armor and make him vulnerble to damage (more on that below).

Best Strategy to Beat Idolator Sol

The first thing players should do is maintain their distance from Idolator Sol in Borderlands 4 . If players get too close to him, they'll stomp his feet into the ground, dealing damage to players. Wait for the boss to trigger the Impaler Rods attack.

Carefully dodge away from the projected area of the rods, and watch for the rod that glows green . Once you find the green rod, use your grapple to get the Locust canister out of it, and throw it at Idolator Sol to strip away the armor coating from the body.

It's recommended to throw the Locust canister at either the area above his torso to expose his head , or the area around his belly to expose green bags on the side . These parts take critical damage, which will be crucial in taking down Idolator Sol faster. Once you've dealt enough damage and burned through three bars of his health, the boss will be defeated.

All Idolator Sol Boss Legendary Rewards in Borderlands 4

Here's a list of all legendary rewards that players can get (and farm) from the Idolator Sol boss in Borderlands 4 .

Legendary

Type

Onslaught

Sub-Machine Gun (SMG)

Goremaster

Shotgun

Technomancer

Mod for Siren Class (Vex)

Bio Robot

Mod for Gravitar Class (Harlowe)

Furnace

Mod for Forgeknight Class (Amon)

Dancer

Mod for Exo-Class Soldier (Rafa)

16

How to Redeem Codes in Fruit Battlegrounds

Players should follow the few steps mentioned below and claim codes for free:

  1. Open Roblox and launch Fruit Battlegrounds
  2. Choose the option Spin Fruit to enter the store.
  3. Click on the chest.
  4. In the screen’s bottom-left corner, you can see the special window for redeeming codes.
  5. Paste the code here and click the Redeem button. Codes will automatically store rewards on the account.

Fruit Battlegrounds Tips & Tricks

Spin Wisely

Players should use gems to spin for fruits and take advantage of the codes provided above to increase their gems count. They'll also want to save and equip rare or legendary fruits for better gameplay.

Use Feature

After 100 spins, players will be guaranteed good fruit. As such, they should keep spinning to make the most of this feature.

Level up efficiently

Using moves repeatedly will lead to them leveling up. Players can either fight other players or use their moves strategically to gain experience points.

Daily rewards

Players should log in daily to collect gems from the daily rewards feature.

Best Roblox Adventure Games Like Fruit Battlegrounds

Eventually, all games get boring or run out of content. In this case, finding new games is a necessity. Therefore, if players want a similar gaming experience, they can find five games like Fruit Battlegrounds listed below:

  • Dragon Race
  • Your Bizarre Adventure
  • Dragon Blox
  • Dragon Warrior Simulator
  • Dragons' Life

item.title: Galaxy Defense Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
Jump Links

  • All Galaxy Defense Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Galaxy Defense
  • How to Get More Galaxy Defense Codes

Galaxy Defense is a strategy tower defense game where you will need to protect the Earth from the fall of various types of asteroids. To handle it, you'll have a bunch of weapons in your arsenal that you can unlock and use over the game, ranging from machine guns to huge deadly lasers.

To unlock the best weapons faster, you'll need to earn a lot of Diamonds and accumulate other resources for upgrades. Luckily, you can get much closer to your goal by redeeming Galaxy Defense codes, which will bring you a bunch of rewards that will definitely come in handy.

Updated September 20, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: A fresh set of codes is available for Galaxy Defense , bringing rewards that include in-game currency, stamina, and enhanced items. The latest codes add even more options to claim, alongside the existing bonuses. You can use them to boost your progress or gain useful items. Keep an eye on this guide, as new updates may bring additional rewards in the future.

All Galaxy Defense Codes

Working Galaxy Defense Codes

  • GDV12CR - Redeem this code to get rewards. (NEW)
  • GDV12IT - Redeem this code to get rewards. (NEW)
  • GDP120K - Redeem this code to get rewards. (NEW)
  • GDV11RA - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV11NG - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV7VY - Redeem this code to get Enhanced Alloys.
  • GDV7HL - Redeem this code to get 100 Diamonds.
  • GDFUN - Redeem this code to get 100 Stamina.
  • GDLUCK - Redeem this code to get 100 Diamonds.

Expired Galaxy Defense Codes

  • GDAR110K - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDLO100K - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV10LF - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV10UZ - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • 90KCHAT - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV9VP - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV9WV - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV9RK - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDHN80K - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDN70K - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDC60K - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV8LH - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV8NC - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV81S - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV82O - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV83R - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV84R - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV85Y - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV6VM - Redeem this code to get six Etching Solvents.
  • GDV6HU - Redeem this code to get five Warrior Chest Keys.

Redeeming Galaxy Defense codes is a quick and convenient way to get rare resources and premium currency. So, if you don't want to spend a lot of time grinding or real money to get these rare items, be sure to redeem Galaxy Defense codes.

How to Redeem Codes for Galaxy Defense

Redemption of Galaxy Defense codes will be accessible as soon as you complete your first training match. From there, you can easily redeem your rewards with just a few clicks, and here's how to do it in this free mobile game:

  • Launch Galaxy Defense .
  • Go to the main menu.
  • Pay attention to the upper-left corner of the screen. There will be your avatar. Click on it.
  • This will open the Profile and Settings menu. Here, in the lower part of the menu, you will find the redemption section, which contains an input field and a yellow Exchange button below it. Now, in the input field, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes.
  • Lastly, click on the yellow Exchange button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a notification on the screen with a list of rewards you have received.

How to Get More Galaxy Defense Codes

You can always come back to this page for the latest Galaxy Defense codes, so bookmark it. Also, you can visit the official Galaxy Defense Discord server. Developers often share codes for this mobile game there, so just be careful not to miss them among other messages and announcements.

Galaxy Defense is available on mobile devices.

How to Redeem Codes in Driving Empire

Like with many other Roblox games, Driving Empire codes are available for everyone. To redeem them, players need only follow the straightforward steps below to claim their free rewards:

  1. Open Roblox and launch Driving Empire.
  2. Look in the bottom left corner and press the Settings button here.
  3. From here, go into the Codes tab and insert the code into the text box.
  4. Once done, press Submit and claim rewards.

Codes can only be redeemed once per account. That said, players can claim the same code on multiple accounts.

How to Play Driving Empire

Playing Driving Empire is very simple and fun. To begin with, after the player has appeared in the world, they'll need to choose a car. There are many real-world cars in the game and each of them has its own characteristics, but only two cars will be available at first. To earn money, players have to drive, drift, and participate in races. For the money earned, players can buy a new car or motorbike. With the Driving Empire codes in this article, Roblox players can buy new vehicles even faster.

The Best Roblox Racing Games Like Driving Empire

There are a lot of Roblox games with the theme of racing and cars in general, and among them are plenty of good ones that offer an interesting gaming experience. In this article, players will find the best games like Driving Empire :

  • Car Dealership Tycoon
  • Drive World
  • Southwest Florida
  • Vehicle Legends
  • Ultimate Driving

About the Driving Empire Developers

Driving Empire was created by a group of developers who call themselves Voldex. Although they have released one game so far, their Roblox group already has 2 million members.
